author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

After the "ATTF / O+C / PPD / XPOG Meeting" (https://indico.cern.ch/event/1167839/) we realized that from 12_4_X many people will use the Run-3 GTs, and the naming convention that `phase1_2021*` is meant to be used for 2022 will be confusing for many people. This PR does a purely technical change of renaming that. 

The diffs in the GTs are null:
 * https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2021_design_v3/124X_mcRun3_2022_design_v3
 * https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v3/124X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v3
 * https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/124X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_realistic_deco_v4
 * https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_design_deco_v3/124X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_design_deco_v3
 * https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/124X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v3/124X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v3

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, but should be backported to 12_4_X
title: Rename `phase1_2021*` to `phase1_2022*`
